page.title: 08POSSESSIONS IN THE HOME
page.content: A survey of 80 families in the school's catchment area within the study area provided information suggesting that electrical power is very much relied upon in home life. The figures show how many out of 80 surveyed answered postively to having the following: Automatic washing machine 64 Dishwasher 4 Toaster 24 Video 41 Twintub washing machine 11 Stereo 67 Tumble drier 39 Electric mixer 50 Coffemaker 28 Microwave 5 Clock radio 35 Food processor 13 Full size television 64 Sandwich maker 35 Portable television 45 Slide projector 10 Cassette recorder/radio 47 Cassette recorder 46 Electric blanket 28 Teasmade 20 Mower other than a push one 47. The high number of items producing sound/piucture was something noticed.
